body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, soldier and shoemaker. Native of Bavaria. Married Maria Steller Simon in Jefferson County on May 3, 1849. Father of Caroline Simon, John Simon, Frank Simon, Mary Simon, and S. Simon. Served in the 9th U.S. Infantry as a private from October 27, 1847 to August 22, 1848. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1850. Shoemaker in Louisville in 1860.
